TITLE: Big Tech backs embattled green card bill ahead of key House vote
SUMMARY: Big Tech companies are backing an immigration bill that would abolish per-country caps on employment visas -- ahead of the bill's vote in the House later on Tuesday.

TITLE: This Democrat says he's not leaving the Dem party — at least not right now
SUMMARY: West Virginia Senator Joe Manchin said that he does not plan on leaving the Democratic Party right now, following recent departures.

TITLE: Fetterman's new chief of staff co-founded The Moscow Project that pushed Trump-Russia collusion narrative
SUMMARY: The incoming chief of staff for Pennsylvania Democratic Sen. elect-John Fetterman co-founded a website that routinely accused former President Donald Trump of colluding with Russia.

TITLE: Manchin urges White House to keep Title 42 border policy in place
SUMMARY: Sen. Joe Manchin is demanding that President Biden extend a pandemic emergency order blocking illegal immigrants from entering the United States under Title 42.

TITLE: HHS approves Washington state request to offer health insurance to illegal immigrants, citing 'health equity'
SUMMARY: President Biden's administration has approved a modification to the Affordable Care Act in Washington State that will allow illegal immigrants to enroll.

TITLE: 2024 showdowns: Biden tops Trump but trails DeSantis in national poll's potential match ups
SUMMARY: A new national poll suggests GOP Gov. Ron DeSantis of Florida topping President Biden in a hypothetical 2024 presidential election matchup, but that Biden leads former President Trump

TITLE: The Republican Party is divided in support of former President Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
SUMMARY: The Republican party is divided in support for former President Trump, in the first month after launching his third presidential campaign.

TITLE: Pentagon’s fixation on gender, ‘safe spaces’ evades congressional probe after Democrats vote it down
SUMMARY: A House committee on Tuesday rejected a GOP request for information about Defense Department policies dealing with gender, after Democrats rejected the effort.

TITLE: Fox News Politics: Democrats who ditched their party
SUMMARY: Get the latest updates from the 2024 campaign trail, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content

TITLE: LGBTQ activist exposed by Rep. Nancy Mace: ‘Do you believe your rhetoric is a threat to democracy?’
SUMMARY: Rep. Nancy Mace on Tuesday exposed a transgender activist for saying violent rhetoric is dangerous, even though she has called for violence against the Supreme Court.

TITLE: Fox News footage shows mass release of migrants into US, as numbers hit 500,000 for FY 23
SUMMARY: Fox News footage shows the continued release of migrants at the southern border as authorities face a looming end to the Title 42 expulsion authority just days away.

TITLE: Dianne Feinstein says she won't step down early despite concerning mental health reports
SUMMARY: Sen. Diane Feinstein, D-Calif, says she will serve out the remainder of her term to 2024, rebuking those who have raised concerns about her mental fitness.

TITLE: Biden admin seeks $4 billion in additional border funding, predicts post-Title 42 border surge
SUMMARY: The Biden administration is requesting $4 billion in DHS funding as it faces a potential surge in migrant encounters at the southern border once Title 42 ends next week.

TITLE: Veterans Affairs sued over new abortion rule after Roe rollback that allegedly violates religious liberty
SUMMARY: A lawsuit against the Department of Veterans Affairs alleges the agency is violating the First Amendment with a new rule allowing abortions to be provided by the department.

TITLE: Biden denounces GOP states that limit child gender surgeries during same-sex marriage bill-signing ceremony
SUMMARY: The president signed the Respect for Marriage Act into law Tuesday with numerous guests ranging from cabinet members, lawmakers and non-binary drag queens at the White House.

TITLE: 20 House Republicans push Congress to impeach DHS chief Alejandro Mayorkas
SUMMARY: Twenty Republicans demanded on Tuesday that the U.S. House of Representatives impeach Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas next Congress.

TITLE: Poll shows Biden's low level of support in 2024 among Democratic primary voters
SUMMARY: A new Five Thirty Eight/Ipsos poll revealed that President Joe Biden and Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis are the two frontrunners

TITLE: Teen charged in shooting outside Rep. Lee Zeldin's home indicted in New York gang takedown
SUMMARY: The accused gunman in a shooting outside Rep. Lee Zeldin's home, 18-year-old Noah Green, is among alleged gang members charged in a new 148-count indictment in Suffolk County, New York.

TITLE: GOP bill would protect parents who refuse to transition their child's gender
SUMMARY: A bill introduced Tuesday by Rep. Virginia Foxx, R-N.C., seeks to protect parents who refuse to transition their child's gender, either socially or medically.
